Key Match Events: Skenes pitched two perfect innings in his Yankee Stadium debut
Pirates hit five homers, including four off rookie Luis Gil
Yankees' Aaron Judge singled to right, scoring Cabrera
Yankees' J. Chisholm Jr. doubled to right, scoring Wells
Pirates' Y. Grandal singled to center, scoring Palacios
Pirates' N. Yorke homered to left, scoring Grandal
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain delays led to the game being postponed until the next day
